channel.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2nk2zva.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]A little background:[/b] Surreal Scape, is made by a few people who have endured both RS and RSPS for over 6 years. I myself, the Lead Developer, have been Admin/Global Moderator on many servers, the biggest, Frugooscape. I also have been in many communities around the internet and left a rather large footprint since the age of 10 and my birthday gift of a computer. I know how communities fail, and it's a pattern that's often repeated... well always repeated. Community is the most important part of a Server for me. So I'll work with people like Troy. Troy has a very similar past in communities to mine (do realize I've trimed that in 1/1000th to keep the post short.) and as a Community manager, he'll keep things smooth.
We also have LunarKnight, a RSPS developer and player who also shares a similar path. He is great at client-side models, animations, and pretty much all around when needed. We all converged together about 3-4 years ago via Frugooscape. We've seen so many crappy servers. So many poorly made servers with cheap tricks that make players love them.
But that isn't it. The main reason is we don't like how the games we love are run. Some of the best RSPS's have poorly run staff that is crooked and plays favourites. Well, they all do. The staff also can usually lay down oppression and abuse. I don't like how staff is given to friends either. Having our own server while emulating the fun, means we can eliminate this. We can stop the root of the problem, or a big part of it. Once we know our staff is good, we can focus on the Community members.
[b]Features:[/b] Fast, Light-weight server based on Shard, so promises Stability. Crash-patched. Smooth Combat that isn't half-assed. A very nice 317 Client. Pickup Items. (Still deciding.) Highscores. vBulletin Community. Domain name, no .tk, no free sites with pop-ups and spyware. Skills done right without Shortcuts. Staff that deserves the position as-well as excels at it.
About Pickup. I feel that if the skills are at a slower rate, say... x2 or x3, it makes up for allowing players to be able to spawn items. I think skills are more important than items, and as long as skills are a challenge (minus prayer) having spawning doesn't damage.
[b]Progress:[/b] 70% Done with Client. Fixing bugs, adding new designs, custom graphics for start screen, and models. 60% on PvNPC Combat need to work on Specials. Flawless calculations though.
[b]Media:[/b] None at the given moment.
[b]Team:[/b] Lead Developer->SolarKnight Client/All-Around->LunarKnight Community Manager->Troy

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

RiotScape is the best wl can offer.

I would also like to throw my name into hosting.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @SolarKnight SolarKnight
item.description:
@SolarKnight wrote:

Possibly, I’d like to get to know you better before anything happens though.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @thanks_u thanks u
item.description:
@thanks_u wrote:

Bice Hey Can I Be With U And Help You Code And I CAn Host The SErver 24/7 When ITs Done

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @SolarKnight SolarKnight
item.description:
@SolarKnight wrote:

I know it is still wL. But is at the top, and probably the most stable. If I had the time to commit to something like Hyperion, I would. Also, I know, that is the crash patch I have.

And no, even for wL, Shard is not like Delta. Look at how much they can hold/ratio to ram etc. Shard is the best wL gets. So if not a framework, I figured at least use Shard.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @sig00 sig00
item.description:
@sig00 wrote:

Looks good, I wish you luck, and just to put my input on this, I wouldn’t have the pickup items, I think more people hate it than like it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

When you say poorly programmed servers you should add SHARD into that, SHARD is just as bad as a delta or czar server. It may be written better, cleaner, but SHARD is still a peace of shit compared to better higher performance scratch servers. I see what your saying still, wl servers are easier to program them most of the other scratch frameworks.

I will also point out that there is another crash patch that fixes the many problems with the Cryption class. One last suggestion is using a API like Netty or Mini to do your networking.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @SolarKnight SolarKnight
item.description:
@SolarKnight wrote:

I know, but I like winterLove. Shard is fine.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Shard is done, use Hyperion or a newer framework.

Good luck with your development never the less.

EDIT: I also have a hard time believing that you’ve been a part of rsps and rs for 6 years yet you just joined Mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Shard] Surreal Scape
item.dc:creator: @SolarKnight SolarKnight
item.description:
@SolarKnight wrote:

[center]

2nk2zva.jpg757×85
[/center]

A little background:
Surreal Scape, is made by a few people who have endured both RS and RSPS for over 6 years. I myself, the Lead Developer, have been Admin/Global Moderator on many servers, the biggest, Frugooscape. I also have been in many communities around the internet and left a rather large footprint since the age of 10 and my birthday gift of a computer. I know how communities fail, and it’s a pattern that’s often repeated… well always repeated. Community is the most important part of a Server for me. So I’ll work with people like Troy. We all converged together about 3-4 years ago via Frugooscape. We’ve seen so many crappy servers. So many poorly made servers with cheap tricks that make players love them.

But that isn’t it. The main reason is we don’t like how the games we love are run. Some of the best RSPS’s have poorly run staff that is crooked and plays favourites. Well, they all do. The staff also can usually lay down oppression and abuse. I don’t like how staff is given to friends either. Having our own server while emulating the fun, means we can eliminate this. We can stop the root of the problem, or a big part of it. Once we know our staff is good, we can focus on the Community members.

Features:
Fast, Light-weight server based on Shard, so promises Stability.
Crash-patched.
Smooth Combat that isn’t half-assed.
A very nice 317 Client.
Pickup Items. (Still deciding.)
Highscores.
vBulletin Community.
Domain name, no .tk, no free sites with pop-ups and spyware.
Skills done right without Shortcuts.
Staff that deserves the position as-well as excels at it.

About Pickup. I feel that if the skills are at a slower rate, say… x2 or x3, it makes up for allowing players to be able to spawn items. I think skills are more important than items, and as long as skills are a challenge (minus prayer) having spawning doesn’t damage.

Progress: 70% Done with Client. Fixing bugs, adding new designs, custom graphics for start screen, and models.
60% on PvNPC Combat need to work on Specials. Flawless calculations though.

Media: None at the given moment.

Team:
Lead Developer->SolarKnight
Client/All-Around->LunarKnight
Community Manager->Troy
